column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " Lu and Gang are idiots .
#Text=What 's this idea of yours ?
#Text=" Mako says : " A sting operation .
#Text=I was thinking we 'd set up a bait ship , take it out into the open ocean , and capture whoever attacks it .
#Text=" Asami says : " Let 's do it .
#Text=" Mako says : " It 's not that easy .
#Text=For the plan to work , we need the police , and Beifong already said no .
#Text=" Asami says : " We can make it work , just the two of us .
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't know .
#Text=I do n't want to go behind Beifong 's back .
#Text=If she finds out , I could get kicked off the force .
#Text=" Asami says : " Mako , I need your help .
#Text=My Mom is gone .
#Text=My Dad is in jail .
#Text=Future Industries is all I have left of my family .
#Text=" Mako says : " I want to help you , but this is more than a two - person job .
#Text=First of all , we 'd need a ship .
#Text=" Varrick says : " You need a ship ?
#Text=I got a ship .
#Text=I want in on whatever you 're talking about .
#Text=I love being in on plans .
#Text=" Asami says : " The less you know , the better .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Perfect !
#Text=I love not knowing things .
#Text=" Mako says : " All right , I 'm in .
#Text=Let 's get these guys .
#Text="
